script.title: Great Work
script.body: We're adjusting our recs based on your interactions. if you enjoy what you're seeing something, make sure you use the buttons to give the algorithm a signal.

script.title: We Want Your Feedback
script.body: Is this content matching your interests?

script.title: Great!
script.body: But the algorithm isn't magic. Here's what we know about you:

script.title: Good to know.
script.body: We'll show you what we know about you and you can tell us if it's right:

script.title: Good to know.
script.body: We're showing you some new content, but we might not be getting the balance right. We'll show you what we know about you:

script.title: Great!
script.body: But remember, these can always change. Here are the signals that we pick up on to make these inferences. Knowing how we measure can help you customize your feed:

script.title: Got it.
script.body: There can be a mismatch between the signals we pick up on and what you intend. Knowing how we measure can help you customize your feed:
You can review how your data is changing by clicking the icon on the lower left as you continue to scroll.

script.title: Thanks for helping us test our app!
script.body:
Some academics, policymakers, etc. think that having one algorithm is bad and that being able to choose from multiple options will give a better and safer experience.

 We're still thinking about this proposal and the best way to implement it. There are a few algorithms in our system that users of our app have helped us make.

You can explore them and let us know which ones speak to you!
